text: "Philia" is the sixth single by Versailles, released on March 16, 2011.http://www.cdjapan.co.jp/detailview.html?KEY=WPCL-10925 The title track was used as the theme song to the TV show Onegai Kanaete Versailles, which starred the band themselves. The single came in three editions, each with a different cover: a regular with just the CD, and two limited editions each with a different DVD.http://www.discogs.com/Versailles-Philia/master/319745 The first included live performances from their concert at Shibuya C.C. Lemon Hall on September 4, 2010, the other has a promotional video for the title track that is different from the one used to promote on TV. == Track listing == == References == Category:Versailles (band) songs Category:2011 singles Category:Songs written by Hizaki Category:2011 songs Category:Songs written by Kamijo (musician) Category:Warner Music Japan singles
title: Philia (song)
